articles.author: Felix Onuah
articles.title: Niger coup: West African bloc activates standby force for possible intervention - Reuters
articles.description: West Africa's regional bloc on Thursday ordered the activation of a standby force for possible use against the junta that took power in Niger in July, saying it wanted a peaceful restoration of democracy but all options including force were on the table.
